About.title: Our Journey & Mission
About.description: Driven by passion, defined by excellence. Discover the story behind Nusrat.
About.missionDesc: To empower businesses and professionals through cutting-edge technology and innovative solutions that drive real-world value and sustainable growth.
About.visionDesc: To be the most trusted global partner for team excellence and digital transformation, known for our integrity and technical mastery.
About.integrityDesc: Honesty and transparency in every collaboration.
About.innovationDesc: Constantly pushing the boundaries of what's possible.
About.excellenceDesc: Striving for perfection in every line of code.
About.milestonesSub: A timeline of our growth and achievements

2018.title: The Beginning
2018.description: Nusrat was founded as a small group of ambitious developers in Tashkent.

2020.title: Scaling Up
2020.description: Expanded our expertise to AI and cloud architecture, serving our first international clients.

2022.title: Excellence Hub
2022.description: Established our core values and moved into a larger collaborative space.

2024.title: Global Impact
2024.description: Successfully delivered over 150+ projects worldwide with 98% client satisfaction.

2026.title: Vision 2026
2026.description: Aiming to lead the regional digital transformation and integrate AI into every professional workflow.

Projects.title: Portfolio
Projects.description: Exploring our latest work and innovative breakthroughs.

1.title: EcoSphere AI
1.description: EcoSphere AI is a revolutionary platform designed to help municipal governments monitor and optimize urban environmental health in real-time. Using a network of sensors and advanced machine learning models, the system predicts air quality fluctuations and recommends proactive measures to reduce pollution peaks.
highlights: Reduced urban energy costs by 15% in pilot cities.
Integrated with 10,000+ IoT sensors across the grid.
Real-time data visualization dashboard for city officials.

2.title: GlobalPay Next
2.description: GlobalPay Next is a cross-border payment gateway designed for international financial markets. It offers businesses real-time settlement across multiple currencies, low fee rates, and the highest level of security. The system bridges complex banking infrastructures with an easy-to-integrate API.
highlights: Capable of handling 5000+ transactions per second.
Supports 30+ major fiat and digital currencies.

3.title: Nusrat Dashboard
3.description: Custom-built for the Nusrat team, this dashboard serves as the central hub for project management, resource allocation, and team growth tracking. It leverages AI-driven insights to automate internal workflows and optimize efficiency.
highlights: Accelerated project delivery times by 20% on average.
Automated resource allocation and KPI tracking.
